product_name: The North Face Waterproof Lumbar Pack - Large - 2013 Closeout
long_description: With waterproof construction and a comfortable waistbelt style, the Waterproof Lumbar pack from The North Face keeps your camera, phone or GPS unit protected from wet weather during any adventure. Ripstop nylon features a double coating of polyurethane to keep gear nice and dry. mesh exterior pocket and main compartment with roll-top closure; 2 hipbelt pockets. The North Face Waterproof lumbar pack features lightweight, adjustable straps. Closeout.
short_description: With waterproof construction and a comfortable waistbelt style, the Waterproof Lumbar pack from The North Face keeps your camera, phone or GPS unit protected from wet weather during any adventure.
